title: Songs 4 Worship Kids - 2002 - Vol 01 - Awesome God
description:
Songs 4 Worship Kids - 2002 - Vol 01 - Awesome God


TRACK LISTING:

01 - Lovely Noise
02 - Praise Him, All Ye Little Childre
03 - Awesome God
04 - The Path of the Righteous
05 - Give Thanks
06 - Change My Heart O God
07 - A Hallelujah Heart
08 - Jesus Sees
09 - Fairest Lord Jesus
10 - Open the Eyes of My Heart
11 - Every Move I Make
12 - Shine
13 - Deep in the Heart, Peace Like a Right
14 - More Precious Than Silver
15 - Jehovah-Jireh
16 - I Will Bless Thee O Lord
17 - Jesus Name Above All Names
18 - I Was Made to Praise You
19 - Blessed Be the Name of the Lord
20 - Thy Word


ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

There is a basic formula in making a successful children's music CD: it's gotta be cool enough for the kids while staying tolerable enough to withstand repeated listens by the parent. Songs 4 Worship Kids: Awesome God passes the test and is a worthwhile product for any parent seeking to expose their child to safe and quality music. Well recorded and arranged, the CD offers standard contemporary worship fare like "Give Thanks," "Change My Heart, O God," "More Precious Than Silver," and "Thy Word." The release also features a creative reworking of Rich Mullins's "Awesome God," intersplicing choruses with Bible verses read by the children artists. "Jesus Sees" is another track that will speak to children in their own voice and language. The upbeat "Every Move I Make" is also a winner. There are a few dull moments that fall flat, like the too-adult "Open the Eyes of My Heart." But for the most part, parents will be relieved to know that the CD is lively enough to keep kids' interest before they start wanting the latest Britney Spears, N'Sync, or Nelly release. --Michael Lyttle 


TORRENTED BY:
